key_risks: Regulatory and cybersecurity risks due to reliance on SEC and ESMA frameworks and past cybersecurity breaches
Economic sensitivity tied to capital markets activity
Intense competitive pressures from traditional and fintech competitors
Debt and financial stability concerns related to compliance with debt covenants
controversies: 2019 cybersecurity breach resulting in theft of personal information of over 200,000 individuals
environmental_issues: Introduction of eco-friendly practices in print and distribution services
social_issues: Generally positive employee sentiment with 60% recommending the company and a positive business outlook
governance_issues: Potential governance challenges related to regulatory dependence and cybersecurity management

sources.title: Mediant Communications Must Face Some Claims Over Data Breach
sources.snippet: Phillip Toretto sued after an April 2019 data breach in which hackers stole the personal information of 200,000 individuals from Mediant's business email accounts. He alleged that the hack was enabled by Mediant's poor network security, and that the company failed to encrypt personal information and adequately notify its customers.
